meta.learningGoals: <par>In this skill you should master <term>expanding brackets</term>. If you see a term like <inline-math/> you should turn this into <inline-math/>. This includes simplifying the number multiplications (so <inline-math/> becomes <inline-math/>) and turning multiplications of identical factors into powers (so <inline-math/> becomes <inline-math/>).</par>
